abstract: College Basketball Women's Roundup; South Carolina tops North Carolina, 67-65, in NCAA tournament round of 16; other tourney results noted.
lead_paragraph: Tiffany Mitchell drove to the basket and scored with 4.2 seconds left, and South Carolina edged North Carolina, 67-65, in the N.C.A.A. tournament’s round of 16 in Greensboro, N.C.

headline.main: South Carolina Tops U.N.C. on Late Shot
headline.print_headline: Gamecocks Top Tar Heels on Late Shot

snippet: Tiffany Mitchell drove to the basket and scored with 4.2 seconds left, and South Carolina edged North Carolina, 67-65, in the N.C.A.A. tournament’s round of 16 in Greensboro, N.C.
